message: I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to let it go for $180.
Thank you for offering me the product. I appreciate your enthusiasm. I would like to propose a price of $150 for the product.
I understand you're looking for a good deal, but I'm not willing to go as low as $150. I can do $165 for the product. It's a fair price considering its value.
I understand your position, but given my budget constraints, I am unable to meet the price of $165. I would like to propose a final offer of $145 for the product.
